links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,3,0,-3,0,1).
mathematica: Array[{#, #^2} &, 36, 0] // FlattenRiffle[Range[40], Range[40]^2] (* _Bruno Berselli_, Jul 15 2013 *)a[ n_] := If[ OddQ @ n, (n + 1) / 2, n^2 / 4]; (* _Michael Somos_, May 28 2014 *)
prog: (MAGMA) &cat[ [ n, n^2 ]: n in [1..36] ]; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Apr 20 2009(Haskell)a000463 n = a000463_list !! (n-1)a000463_list = concatMap (\x -> [x,x^2]) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 13 2011(PARI) {a(n) = if( n%2, (n + 1) / 2, n^2 / 4)}; /* _Michael Somos_, May 28 2014 */
